editorialSummary.text: French luxury brand founded in 1906 showcasing a collection of fine jewelry, watches & fragrances.

originalText.text: The female (Caucasian) sales professional came across as racist. She failed to acknowledge my presence when I walked into the location and didn’t bother to assist me. The gentleman that assisted was very friendly and helpful. Won’t ever be returning to this location however.

text.text: The female (Caucasian) sales professional came across as racist. She failed to acknowledge my presence when I walked into the location and didn’t bother to assist me. The gentleman that assisted was very friendly and helpful. Won’t ever be returning to this location however.

originalText.text:
DO NOT SHOP HERE !NEVER!  All the staff are rude! I bought a necklace, but  the service was terrible! I saw other customers! They received the necklace case but I didn’t received any case! So I went back to the store again! I asked where my case is! They said The case is not coming out now!!
I paid over 3,000 dollars, but can I be ignored like this? I told me that they don’t have case only very very small pouch. One of agent said they give the pouch instead of case and the other said he is going to send it to my house. So, I said I wanted to return it, and then they are going to check up. After that, they gave me the case, but get the pouch back. All agents lied to me not to give me the case. This store is just garbage. Also, I wanted to get the business card of the man who took care of me, he didn’t give it to me. I think he is afraid of that I know his name. Please please do not go there.

originalText.text: Can’t get enough!!  Always love Tiffany and VCA. The earring and bracelets are something definitely need to get here! Nice service! Bought in store and shipped to Jersey, saving 2% on tax which is very nice

text.text: Can’t get enough!!  Always love Tiffany and VCA. The earring and bracelets are something definitely need to get here! Nice service! Bought in store and shipped to Jersey, saving 2% on tax which is very nice

originalText.text: I will never shop at another VCA store ever again! My husband and I have a collection of pieces from various locations in Paris and London. On a whim, we decided to walk in to check out this location during one of our visits to NYC last year. From that moment on, Yuliya has been the most amazing SA we could ever ask for! We've gotten 4 wonderful pieces from her the last year and a half. Even though we live in Florida, I will only purchase with Yuliya and have it shipped to our house. With every visit to NYC, we always make time to see her. You will not be disappointed with the service. Thanks for everything as always! :D

originalText.text:
Kerry is literally the best sales associate! She is super patient and lets you try on everything you’re interested in. Make sure to ask for her if you want a good experience!

Edit: Kerry no longer works at VCA, but my new SA, Day, is amazing!! Definitely ask for him!
